review: I have the Fire and now the Stick.  Easy to set up and use.
author: deb "Debbie"

review: Perfect gift! We can now easily watch  Amazon Prime programs right on our TV.
author: Bridgette

review: Easy to use , easy to set up very pleased.
author: Nancy Hansen

review: No HBOGo yet.... all the others have it. When is it coming to the Amazon Fire stick?
author: Dawn Feist

review: The Fire TV Stick is a pretty nice media streamer, especially for the price.  It's comparable to other brand media streamers. The one downside I found was that it had to be plugged into a power source.
author: Mr. K
